snippet: A ski technician plays a behind-the-scenes role that is part crew chief, part caddie. Ales Sopotnik spends countless hours tuning the U.S. Alpine racer Leanne Smith’s skis.
lead_paragraph: A ski technician plays a behind-the-scenes role that is part crew chief, part caddie. Ales Sopotnik spends countless hours tuning the U.S. Alpine racer Leanne Smith’s skis.

headline.main: Video: The Art of Tuning Skis
